products.title: Splash Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Beige Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured roller blind will make a wonderful addition to any room and will compliment wooden tones thoughout the home. Our roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1894 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Beige
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Beige Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
